section.title: The Sámi webinterface
section.p: The web interface is accessed via our external pages, at giellatekno.uit.no. The real address is 129.242.176.176, current users (June 2006) are (at least) Saara, Børre and Trond. The files are located at ../../giellatekno/.
The open files are located here since the IT section does not want to maintain a web server on victorio.

section.title: How the webinterface works
section.p: There are two input formats: utf-8 and Latin 1.
When the user has filled in the words to analyse, the form calls the appropriate cgi-bin script, and writes the answer out as utf-8 html
